components.name: Frontend
components.description: A Single Page Application (SPA) developed using React and TypeScript, providing the user interface for the e-commerce platform.

components.name: User Service
components.description: Manages user authentication and profile management, ensuring secure access to user accounts.

components.name: Product Service
components.description: Handles the product catalog and inventory management, allowing users to browse and search for products.

components.name: Order Service
components.description: Responsible for processing and fulfilling customer orders, integrating with the Payment Service for transaction handling.

components.name: User Database
components.description: PostgreSQL database used for storing user-related data securely.

data_flows.description: User submits login credentials through the frontend, which are sent to the User Service for authentication.
User Service retrieves and stores user data in the User Database.
User places an order through the frontend, which communicates with the Order Service to process the order.
Order Service requests payment processing from the Payment Service after an order is placed.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data management from other services, ensuring that sensitive user information is handled securely.

trust_boundaries.name: Payment Processing Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that isolates payment processing to ensure secure transactions and compliance with payment standards.
